title: Don't miss out on our beautiful top floor studio apartment in DTLA!!!
posting_body: ['Medici is the premier resort apartment community gracing the dynamic new downtown Los Angeles skyline.', 'The twelve unique floor plans assure you will find the right home to fit your lifestyle.', 'The Medici is the best choice for upscale living in Los Angeles.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Frost-Free, Double Door Refrigerator with Ice Maker', '-Private Balconies and Patios', '-Peaceful, Lushly Landscaped Courtyards', '-Cable Ready', '-Dedicated Gated Parking For Residents', '-24-7 On-site Management', '-Washer/Dryer In-Unit', '-Serene and Tranquil', '-Central Air/Heating', '-Self-Cleaning Oven with Range', '-Copy & Fax Services', '-Beautiful Los Angeles City Views from Many Vantage Points', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '722
